Name: Survive on Raft
About the game: A terrible plane crash took the lives of all the passengers and crew... except for one. You survive in the middle of the endless ocean and now you have to challenge fate and fight for your life. The exhausting sun, terrible thunderstorms and a hungry shark scurrying around nearby, which is not averse to testing you and your raft, will become your constant companions. Get resources and food, learn blueprints for new buildings and build your raft. And don't forget to keep an eye on your thirst and hunger! Multiplayer for 5 players Get resources, build your raft and help each other survive in this endless and dangerous ocean. Remember, teamwork is your key to survival! Craft & Building More than 60 different types of useful craft and buildings! You can build a grandiose house right in the middle of the ocean! Islands 10 unique islands with their own dangers, mysteries and valuable treasures are waiting for you. But before sailing, do not forget to stock up on weapons and provisions. Adventure awaits! Character Customization Hundreds of combinations of different types of clothing and accessories will help you show your personality and stand out from your team. Survive in style! Wandering Merchant The lone wanderer will gladly share with you interesting stories from his travels, give you useful advice and exchange your resources for blueprints of new buildings.
